titles.title: To terminate the price support and marketing quota programs for peanuts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs.

committee.subcommittee: Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 6/21/2001--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to terminate the peanut price support program.Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to terminate the peanut marketing quota program.Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from making price supports available for the 2001 and subsequent peanut crops.
